name: 3D Game Thing
body:
### Welcome to the Page for a 3D Game Thing.
This project is a small 3D Game Environment that I use to test out developing 3D games. 

Typically this is used to test out concepts.

It is still in development and as such it is still continuously updated.
The build and web demo are updated at the end of each day where work was done on it.

All assets were created by Unity Technologies.

To try it out...

[Click Here](http://protein.mts.uri.edu/MPet/3DThingProj/index.html)

```
Updates:
April 15, 2014
Finally got a small break from schoolwork:
- added the ability talk to the NPC, added what has been described as,
"a gripping narrative"
- created a few Scripts to create a series of nodes for AI to travel on
(not actually coded in yet)
- created some Scenes for upcoming experiments involving AI and 2D
Physics
- unfortunately, player character's weird turn-run has not yet been
fixed

April 6, 2014
Removed unused files...
...which fixed the Unity Editor crashing
Added an NPC
```

[Back to Main Page](http://mvpet.github.io/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
